name: docus-workspace
description: Minimal Documentation theme and CLI for shared usage across Nuxt modules

scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt prepare layer && nuxt prepare docs --extends ../layer && nuxt prepare playground --extends ../layer
scripts.verify: pnpm run dev:prepare && pnpm run lint && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run docs:build
scripts.release: pnpm run layer:release && pnpm run cli:release && release-it
scripts.clean: rm -rf .nuxt .output node_modules cli/node_modules docs/.nuxt docs/.data docs/node_modules layer/node_modules layer/.data analyze cli/dist docs/.nuxt docs/.output layer/.nuxt playground/.nuxt playground/.output playground/node_modules playground/.data pnpm-lock.yaml .pnpm-store
